segments.text: I am checking out . Here is the key to my room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I'll just print out your receipt , and then you're free to go . Here you go !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you don't mind me asking , how did you enjoy your stay at New York Hotel ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This hotel could use some insecticide , but my time in New York was thoroughly delightful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's very honest of you . Rest assured that this hotel will have no insects next time .
segments.speaker: S2
